lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds’s personal trainer asked a federal appeals court to free him from prison for refusing to testify before a grand jury investigating Bonds. The trainer, Greg Anderson, who has appeared five times before two federal grand juries, filed court papers late Wednesday through his lawyer, Mark Geragos.
